backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor canister.
feature_evidence.json: Declares feature evidence linking the Rose Day special-message button to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App.tsx, emoji hook, global styles, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style sheet defining OKLCH CSS variables, dark mode variants, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI with emoji rain, Rose Day message card, and a toggleable special message button using stopPropagation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity via React Query with automatic invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useEmojiRain.ts: Hook that spawns falling emojis continuously and on bursts, removing them after animation ends.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context/provider, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles including Poppins font, gradient background, card and special-message styling, and emoji fall animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom fonts, OKLCH color variables, container settings, and animation/typography plugins.
